website_summaries.verdict: The tennis ball on this tool can be removed for play – and replaced with a standard tennis ball just in case.
pros: Tennis ball attaches to top of phone to hold pet's attention
Ball can also be used for play or agility training
Equipped for both forward and rear-facing cameras
Works with most smartphones and tablets
Easy to replace with a standard tennis ball if the dog destroys it
cons: May not fit over larger smartphone cases
Tennis ball may have a slight odor at first, but it is non-toxic and will dissipate

customer_reviews.title: Great for ball-loving dogs!
customer_reviews.text: Seems a bit flimsy but my ball mad Lab loved it & it caught his attention great. The dogs who don’t care so much for balls couldn’t have cared less & it made no difference for them. However, if you have a ball mad dog, you’ll get great “full on” photos with it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great product to take pics with your dogs! They never look straight at the camera and the first shot I got them!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Mejia

customer_reviews.title: Heads Up Doggies
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, fun to use to get my dog's attention for photos. Does not seem to scratch my phone or anything, cool product.
customer_reviews.author: run2it

customer_reviews.title: If you have a case on your phone it won't ...
customer_reviews.text: If you have a case on your phone it won't stay on your phone . My husband takes his off and uses it but it's a pain .
customer_reviews.author: Ann B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My dog cannot take her eyes off the ball, aka my camera!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The only one who liked it was my grandma's dog
customer_reviews.text: Returning. I bought this for my sister for Christmas since her dog notoriously doesn't look at the camera when trying to take his picture. When she tried to use it, not only did it not fit on her phone because of her Otter Box (which a lot of iPhone users have) but the ball didn't stay in the holder. The only one who liked it was my grandma's dog, who likes everything. My sister's dog, however was neither fooled nor impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for instadogs!
customer_reviews.text: Works great for getting our dogs attention!!! Had a hard time getting them to look at me. Now I have lots of pictures of them and created their own Instagram account!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Look at my cute dog
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm, I am not sure how sturdy it is but it definitely helped me to get better pics of my pups
customer_reviews.author: Laura H.

customer_reviews.title: Marketing a foster dog
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Dogs are obsessed with it. This has helped me make a wonderful video of my foster dog.
customer_reviews.author: C. Dingell

customer_reviews.title: Great gadget!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believe I didnt think of this, but oh my, Awesome pup pics now!! Love love love this concept!
customer_reviews.author: S. Cannon

customer_reviews.title: Easiest way to take dog pics
customer_reviews.text: This made taking pics of my dogs so easy. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: melody faria
